TopicTitle: Good KSP Youtubers Not Counting Scott Manley?

Articles.Content:
I've been lurking around the KSp area of Youtube for cool videos related to Kerbal Space Program I couldn't find any good channels when I was searching around. Not counting Scott, it's not that I don't like Scott Manly it's just I've watched almost all of his KSP videos . So, what other KSp Youtubers can you recommend to me and everyone else?

EDIT: Also not counting Robbaz, Nerd Cubed, Danny2462, HOC Gaming.

(Not sure if this would be under GEneral Discussion, if not sorry for my is not...)

Edited June 16, 2013 by irichey25

Robbaz

10characters

EDIT: Strongly NSFW language contained. Proceed with caution.

some people also like the solar gamer (started the international youtube station, and is now getting people to work on the IYMSSm

, check those series out for youtubers) xPDxTVx, Robbaz, the winter owl.... cant think of any others atm tho
I'm actually a big fan of Nerd Cubed and Robbaz, I forgot to mention them. Made an edit for that.

Kurtjmac.

And here is some additional letters to maintain post's required lenght

Stompthompson and ThorLP both have some really good KSP vids, though neither has uploaded much in a while.

Jonorig just listed off 2/3 of my subscription list :/

danny2462

if you look for comedy.

TheWinterOwl.

Also some letters to satisfy minimum post length.

TheWinterOwl.

Also some letters to satisfy minimum post length.

Definitely TheWinterOwl and Kurtjmac. Every episode is fun, informative, and interesting.

Also Macey Dean, if it hasn't been reported before. His ships ... holy Kerbal, Batman!

There you go. Hope you have enough vids for the week
Maybe Duncan (Yogscast)
I've seen also a KSP videos from someone named EvilotionCR2
Definitely Nassault630. His KSP cinematics are jaw dropping.
I'm so hanging out for the next installment from Macey Dean, he's got a good storyline going plus his ships are incredible

Maybe Duncan (Yogscast)

Depends on your definition of 'good'. I liken the pain of watching Duncan have no idea what he's doing to that of having your heart torn out by the Thugee and then slowly lowered into the flaming vortex at the bottom of a huge pit. I guess if you haven't played much KSP yourself he could be enjoyable.

My personal faves:

Kurtjmac (absolute fav, even more than Scott, just wish he would upload more videos)

Danny (always funny)

HOCGaming (generally very good at videos, and has an awesome voice)

SolarGamer (some bad language and such, but not that bad, and is very fun to watch)

Me! Or at least I try...

If anyone is willing to take a look and give opinions, much appreciated!

http://www.youtube.com/user/The1BProducts

I try to make <5 minutes/missions videos for those who want to kill their KSP needs but dont have 20+ minutes to spare.

Btw, i dont like Robbaz...his constant shouting voice drives me crazy and he isnt very good at ksp either.
